name: ClaudeCompanion Context Provider
description: Monitors Claude.ai API quota by sending authentication data to local ClaudeCompanion desktop app. All data stays on your computer.
author: rizmailov

data_collection_permissions.cookies: Required to read sessionKey from claude.ai for API authentication. Sent only to localhost.
data_collection_permissions.webRequest: Required to detect when you visit claude.ai. Does not modify requests.
